description: The Masterâ€™s degree in ICT for Internet and Multimedia (MIME) captures the evolution of the information engineering profession and represents a modern teaching approach that combines both solid fundamental knowledge and advanced technological skills.Focusing on devices, networks, signals, as well as cross-disciplinary issues (big data, photonics, life sciences), the programme offers both strong theoretical courses and applied research-oriented teaching towards advanced technologies for future society.
fees: FeesOur tuition fees will not exceed 2700 euros per year. Scholarship and fee waivers are available for international students, for more information visit our website.
